attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To withdraw the United Kingdom From the Farsical european union. They are no more than a Bunch of Unolected Buearocrats stealing the sovergnty of other nations To Creat a United States Of Europe.We Have not bean allowed a vote by our government So all treaties signed on our behalf are null and void.We there for are not part of this union and do not recognise its laws and directives forced upon us.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
